CONFIG.ua: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/130.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/130.0.0.0

values: 紧张；重点；重要性；负荷；心理负担；造成压力的因素；应力；压强；强调；强调点；压迫感；紧迫感；应激状态；应变；重音；重读；加强音
强调；重读；用重音读；使感到紧迫；使紧张；施加压力；造成压力；使受压力；使受重压；使担忧；使焦虑

synonym.mean: 压力；强调；紧张；重要性；重读
强调；使紧张；加压力于；用重音读

word_mean_info__list.difference: 常可与emphasis换用，但侧重指迫不及待地强调或坚持。
指尽力突出的重要性或重点。
在科学上，指单位面积上所受到的压力。用于引申时，指某事物所产生的压力或影响力等。
指某人为克服外力界压力而造成的身心和情绪等方面的压抑。用于物时，指任何力或合力作用于一个物体上面造成的应变。
侧重指承受外来的压力，也指由于某种原因而引起的心理、生理或情绪上的紧张。
多指因关系不好或其它原因而出现的紧张状态，也指某物被过度伸展的程度或状态。

word_group.brief_definition: 应力响应；应激反应；应力反应
氧化应激；氧化压力；氧化紧迫
应力集中；胁迫浓度；压力浓度
应力强度；应力度；应激强度
压力紊乱；压力障碍；应激紊乱

bilingual.source: Kids these days already have enough stress from school.
bilingual.target: 现在的孩子已经有足够的学校压力了。

bilingual.source: By the end of the run, all my stress has disappeared.
bilingual.target: 跑步结束时，我所有的压力都消失了。

bilingual.source: Linda Miller, a mother of three, knows all about such stress.
bilingual.target: 琳达·米勒，三个孩子的母亲，了解这种压力。

bilingual.source: Not exercising enough can lead to health problems like obesity and stress.
bilingual.target: 运动不足会导致肥胖和压力等健康问题。

bilingual.source: When we eat too much roast or spicy food, or undergo too much physical or emotional stress, our bodies will get "hot", and we will become unwell.
bilingual.target: 当我们吃太多烤肉或辛辣食物，或承受太多身体或情感压力时，我们的身体会变“热”，我们会感到不适。

bilingual.source: He is good at dealing with stress.

bilingual.target: 压力可以影响你的健康。

list.abstract: Stress，英文单词，作名词、动词，翻译为压力、强调、重读等。最初源自古法语的estrece，意为狭小、压抑。
《Stress》是韩国女歌手金泰妍于2015年10月7日正式发行的首张SOLO迷你专辑《I》中的收录曲。 《Stress》是一首突显泰妍明亮歌声的抒情歌曲。

yingyinNormal.en: Yes, it was me. I stress ate them.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是，是我吃的，我压力大就吃掉了。

yingyinNormal.en: You're not having a break down. It's stress.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你没有崩溃啦，只是压力太大。

yingyinNormal.en: Going to the gym. Run off some of this stress.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我要去健身房。跑步消解压力。

yingyinNormal.en: Any deviation from your baseline stress level, doesn't make the needle go all crazy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 与压力零位线有些微偏差，并不会让指针疯狂乱摆。

yingyinNormal.en: My wife has been under a great amount of stress these past 24 hours. She's clearly in shock.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我妻子过去这一天一直压力很大。她显然还余惊未定。

yingyinNormal.en: You know, for a man who's supposed to be avoiding stress you picked a hell of a place to settle.
yingyinNormal.zh: 对于一个需要躲避压力的人来说，你倒是挑了一个好地方。

yingyinNormal.en: Unkar Plutt did. I thought it was a mistake, too. Puts too much stress on the hyperdrive.
yingyinNormal.zh: 昂卡·普拉特做的，我也觉得这是个错误，把太多压力留给了超光速推进器。超光速推进器。

yingyinNormal.en: When I had to take over, the stress, the responsibility, two weeks as president was about as much as I can handle.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我接手的时候，那份压力，责任……两周的总统已经是我的承受极限了。

yingyinNormal.en: So, what's causing this? We have a lot of scientists around the world working on it. We believe that it's environmental stress.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那是什么原因呢?有很多科学家都在研究。我们相信是环境的压力。

yingyinNormal.en: What? Purely physical. It's really just a stress-reliever. I am not having sex with Andy. We're just friends.
yingyinNormal.zh: 什么？纯肉体的，只是释放压力的途径而已，我根本没跟安迪上床，我们只是朋友。

yingyinNormal.en: If one line goes down, it puts extra stress on the system to pick up that line. They service up to 400,000 people and customers.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果断了一条，其它线路要承受额外压力，这关系着40万人的生活。

yingyinNormal.en: A break from what? From Thanksgiving craziness. From stress, from yelling, from these two parading around in dresses.
yingyinNormal.zh: 躲着什么啊？躲着感恩节的疯狂，比如压力，吼叫，以及这二位穿着裙子晃荡。

yingyinNormal.en: Despite the negative effects, MDMA is being studied as a potential therapy for posttraumatic stress disorder and anxiety.
yingyinNormal.zh: 除了这些负面影响，研究显示摇头丸有机会成为治疗创伤后压力症候群和焦虑症的药物。

yingyinNormal.en: The Wolowitz coefficient? Needing us times stress size square counting the numbers I come up with conservative 5812 potential sex partners within a 40miles radius.
yingyinNormal.zh: 沃罗威茨系数？欲望*次数*压力的平方计数来看我周围40英里范围内有5812个潜在性伙伴。

yingyinNormal.en: One hypothesis is that for couples in healthy relationships, sleeping together promotes feelings of safety and security, which may lower levels of the stress hormone cortisol.
yingyinNormal.zh: 其中一个假说是指感情稳定的情侣，一起睡觉能增进安全感，降低体内压力贺尔蒙皮质醇的含量。

yingyinNormal.en: And it means giving our wounded warriors all the care and support they need to heal including mental health care for those with post-traumatic stress or traumatic brain injury.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这意味着给予我们的伤残军人所有他们在痊愈中所需的照料和帮助包括对那些有着创伤后压力或者创伤性脑损伤军人的心理健康护理。

yingyinNormal.en: My father didn't stress diplomacy. Thanos?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我父亲没特别传授外交手腕。萨诺斯？

yingyinNormal.en: Avoiding stress isn't the secret. Then what is it? Yoga?
yingyinNormal.zh: 一味地逃避避也不是万能的。那什么才行？瑜珈？

yingyinNormal.en: I must stress that Will should not be left alone for longer than 15 minutes.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我要强调一下，威尔不能超过15分钟无人看护。

yingyinNormal.en: So, what I want to know is: In these times of great stress, do you do karaoke?
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以我想知道的是在这样的高压之下你还唱卡拉OK吗？

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 使紧张的；压力重的

word_family.mean: n. 压力；重压；精神压力；紧张；着重；强调；重音；重读；压强；造成压力的因素

sense_info_list.en:
become or make someone become too anxious or tired to be able to relax;
pressure or worry caused by the problems in one's life

examination_example.sentence: In fact, the ability to emotionally regulate or maintain emotional control when confronted by <highlight>stress</highlight> is one of the most important of all life's skills.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 事实上，面对压力时，情绪调节或保持情绪控制的能力是所有生活技能中最重要的一项。

examination_example.sentence: Taking a gap year to figure things out initially can help prevent <highlight>stress</highlight> and save money later on.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 用间隔年一开始就把事情弄清楚，可以帮助预防压力，并在以后节省开支。

examination_example.sentence: Hugging protects people who are under <highlight>stress</highlight> from the increased risk for colds that's usually associated with <highlight>stress</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 拥抱可以保护处于压力之下的人，免受通常与压力有关的感冒风险的增加。

sense_info_list.en:
give particular emphasis or importance to (a point, statement, or idea) made in speech or writing;
special emphasis attached to something

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Stress</highlight> the urgency to strengthen security worldwide
examination_example.sentence_trans: 强调加强全球安全的紧迫性

examination_example.sentence: The report supports full literacy; <highlight>stresses</highlight> the study of history and government, particularly American history and American government.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 报告支持全面扫盲；强调对历史和政府的研究，特别是美国历史和美国政府。

examination_example.sentence: The Romantics commemorated the leading painters and authors of their day, <highlight>stressing</highlight> the uniqueness of the artist's personal experience rather than public glory.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 浪漫主义者纪念他们那个时代的杰出画家和作家时，强调艺术家个人经历的独特性，而非公共荣耀。

sense_info_list.en: pressure or tension exerted on a material object

word_usage.usage: stress作动词时，后面可直接跟名词，表示“强调……”，可与lay stress on换用。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 使紧张的；压力重的

word_family.mean: n. 压力；重压；精神压力；紧张；着重；强调；重音；重读；压强；造成压力的因素

sense_info_list.en:
become or make someone become too anxious or tired to be able to relax;
pressure or worry caused by the problems in one's life

examination_example.sentence: When we wear ill-fitting clothes, or feel over- or under-dressed for an event, it's natural to feel self-conscious or even <highlight>stressed</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当我们穿着不合身的衣服，或者觉得在某个活动中穿得太多或太少时，我们很自然会感到害羞甚至紧张。

examination_example.sentence: Without an atmosphere of trust, feedback can create <highlight>stress</highlight> and self-doubt.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 没有信任的氛围，反馈会产生压力和自我怀疑。

examination_example.sentence: We are more likely to lie, research shows, when we are <highlight>stressed</highlight> and fatigued or see others being dishonest.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 研究表明，当我们感到压力和疲惫，或者看到别人不诚实时，我们更容易撒谎。

sense_info_list.en:
give particular emphasis or importance to (a point, statement, or idea) made in speech or writing;
special emphasis attached to something

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Stressing</highlight> the absence of certain elements in their products.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 强调其产品中缺少某些元素。

sense_info_list.en: pressure or tension exerted on a material object

examination_example.sentence: In the areas where one plate is beneath another, <highlight>stress</highlight> builds up over time.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在一块板位于另一块板下方的区域时，应力会随着时间的推移而累积。

sense_info_list.en:
an extra force used when pronouncing a particular word or syllable; 
give extra force to a word or syllable when saying it

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 使紧张的；压力重的
adj. 非重读的；无重音的；不受压力的；无应力的

word_family.mean: n. 压力；重压；精神压力；紧张；着重；强调；重音；重读；压强；造成压力的因素

sense_info_list.en:
become or make someone become too anxious or tired to be able to relax; 
pressure or worry caused by the problems in one's life

examination_example.sentence: Some people believe that there may not exist a <highlight>stress</highlight> gap between men and women.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有些人认为，男性和女性所承受的压力可能差不多。

examination_example.sentence: There's a <highlight>stress</highlight> gap between men and women
examination_example.sentence_trans: 男性和女性所承受的压力之间存在一定的差距。

examination_example.sentence: Besides the airport crowds and <highlight>stress</highlight>, traveling at a high altitude has real effects on the body.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 除了机场的拥挤和压力之外，高空旅行对身体也有实质性的影响。

examination_example.sentence: Its students were overburdened and <highlight>stressed</highlight> out, having to cope with too much work and too many demands.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 学生们的负担过重，压力巨大，作业堆积如山，还有其他各种各样的任务要完成。

examination_example.sentence: The survey commissioned by the district found that 68 percent of high school honor and Advanced Placement students reported feeling <highlight>stressed</highlight> about school "always or most of the time."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 学区的一项调查显示，有68%的高中三好学生和跳级生总是甚至无时无刻不在承受着来自学校的巨大压力。

sense_info_list.en:
give particular emphasis or importance to (a point; statement; or idea) made in speech or writing; 
special emphasis attached to something

examination_example.sentence: It is worth <highlight>stressing</highlight> that these anumeric people are cognitively (在认知方面) normal, well-adapted to the surroundings they have dominated for centuries.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 值得强调的是，这些少数民族认知正常，很好地适应了他们统治了几个世纪的环境。

examination_example.sentence: Creme was among the first chefs who <highlight>stressed</highlight> both the appearance and flavor of dishes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Creme是最早强调菜肴外观和风味的厨师之一。

sense_info_list.en: pressure or tension exerted on a material object

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: become or make someone become too anxious or tired to be able to relax; pressure or worry caused by the problems in one's life

examination_example.sentence: By distracting (分心) the mind from the pain, music, people say, can lower <highlight>stress</highlight> and anxiety levels.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 从转移人们对疼痛的注意力看，人们说，音乐可以降低压力和焦虑水平。

examination_example.sentence: It is also highly popular due to the individualized effects on <highlight>stress</highlight> and anxiety.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它也非常普遍的应对压力和焦虑的个体化影响。

examination_example.sentence: It turns out that just looking at green, growing things can reduce <highlight>stress</highlight>, lower blood pressure, and put people into a better mood.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 事实证明，只是看绿色，成长中的植物可以减轻人们的压力，降低血压，使人们保持良好的心情。

sense_info_list.en: give particular emphasis or importance to (a point, statement, or idea) made in speech or writing; special emphasis attached to something

examination_example.sentence: What should be <highlight>stressed</highlight> in school education according to Schama?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 根据斯伽玛的说法，学校教育应该强调什么？

exam_freq_info.chinese: 精神压力; 心理负担

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 使紧张的；压力重的

word_family.mean: n. 压力；重压；精神压力；紧张；着重；强调；重音；重读；压强；造成压力的因素

sense_info_list.zh: 精神压力; 心理负担

examination_example.sentence: Good notes can lead to less <highlight>stress</highlight> (压力) when test time comes around.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 好的笔记可以减少临考时的压力。

examination_example.sentence: Having some sports drives away your <highlight>stress</highlight> easily most of the time.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大多数时候，做一些运动易于缓解压力。

examination_example.sentence: Doctors say too much <highlight>stress</highlight> is not good for children’s development.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 医生说过多的压力对孩子的成长不利。

examination_example.sentence: Which of the following words doesn't have the same <highlight>stress</highlight> (重音) as the others?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 下面哪个单词的重音和其他单词不一样？

examination_example.sentence: Which word of the following doesn’t have the same <highlight>stress</highlight> as the others?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 下面哪个单词的重音和其他单词不一样？

examination_example.sentence: To <highlight>stress</highlight> the importance of tools in humans' struggle for life.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 强调工具在人类生存斗争中的重要性。

examination_example.sentence: To <highlight>stress</highlight> the importance of improving our memorizing ability.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 强调提高我们记忆力的重要性。
